title: [Math] Understanding the proposed Lich Bane nerfs
body:
If you haven't seen the proposed Lich Bane nerfs on PBE, this is what Riot is testing:

**Live:**
Lich Bane: 80 AP, 250 mana, 5% movespeed
Unique Passive: Spellblade: After using an ability, your next basic attack deals 50 (+ 75% AP) bonus magic damage. 2 second cooldown.

**Under testing:**
Lich Bane: 80 AP, 250 mana, 5% movespeed
UNIQUE Passive - Spellblade: Now deals 75% Base Attack Damage +50% of Ability Power

If you're not good at intuiting the impact of these changes just from looking at some numbers, I crunched some numbers on (some) champions who consider Lich Bane a core item and how this affects them. I specifically chose not to include Akali because her scaling is weird due to her passive.

**Assumptions:**

I considered Lich Bane as the second non-boots item that these champions bought

The champions are level 16. 

Assumed 40 AP from runes, masteries, and a Doran's Ring, which is ballpark close. 

You take Arcane Blade on all of these champions

I included the proposed ratio buffs for Fizz and TF for the new Lich Bane values

This forum doesn't support tables, so ask if you don't understand.

{{champion:105}}  **Fizz** 
Total AP: (40+120 (Zhonya's) + 80 (Lich Bane) = 240

Old Lich Bane (2 procs): 484 damage

New Lich Bane (2 procs): 416 damage

QWER with Old Lich Bane (2 procs): 2005

QWER with New Lich Bane (2 procs): 1961

If Fizz bought Deathcap instead of Lich Bane: 1663

{{champion:10}}  **Kayle** 
Total AP: (40 + 60 (Nashor's Tooth) + 80 (Lich Bane) = 180

Old Lich Bane (2 procs): 338

New Lich Bane (2 procs): 272

QEEE with Old Lich Bane (2 procs): 1255

QEEE with New Lich Bane (2 procs): 1189

If Kayle bought Deathcap instead of Lich Bane: 1171

{{champion:4}}  **Twisted Fate** 
Total AP: (40+120 (Zhonya's) + 80 (Lich Bane) = 240

Old Lich Bane (2 procs): 484

New Lich Bane (2 procs): 413

QWE with Old Lich Bane (2 procs): 1241

QWE with New Lich Bane (2 procs): 1194
If TF bought Deathcap instead of Lich Bane: 986

{{champion:115}}  **Ziggs** 
Total AP: (40 + 60 (Athene's) + 80 (Lich Bane) = 180

Old Lich Bane (2 procs): 388

New Lich Bane (2 procs): 349

Q(P)WERQ(P) with Old Lich Bane (2 procs): 2650

Q(P)WERQ(P) with New Lich Bane (2 procs): 2611
If Ziggs bought Deathcap instead of Lich Bane: 2661

**Let's look at the competitive pick/ban rates for these champions as well:**

{{champion:105}}  **Fizz**

NA LCS:  3.6% pick/ban

EU LCS:  6.7% pick/ban

GPL: 15.2% pick/ban

OGN Masters: 0% pick/ban

LNL (China): 6.3% pick/ban

{{champion:10}} **Kayle**

NA LCS: 44.6% pick/ban rate

EU LCS:  70% pick/ban rate

GPL:  18.2% pick/ban rate

OGN Masters: 0% pick/ban rate

LNL (China): 18.8% pick/ban rate

{{champion:4}} **Twisted Fate**

NA LCS: 0%

EU LCS: 0%

GPL: 3%

OGN Masters: 0%

LNL (China): 0%

{{champion:115}}  **Ziggs**

NA LCS: 28.6%

EU LCS: 51.7%

GPL: 54.5%

OGN Masters: 60%

LNL (China): 87.5%

Out of the 4 champions studied, both Kayle and Ziggs are the only ones who could potentially be problematic in competitive play. Both were already recently nerfed, and that nerf's impact has yet to be fully realized. However, **even if Kayle and Ziggs were the intended targets of this nerf, the nerf barely affects them** while it does significant damage to Fizz and TF, who are competitive non-factors.

All right, enough exposition. I have questions for Riot:

1) Is this nerf targeted at Kayle/Ziggs?

2) If so, are you aware that all this does is remove Lich Bane from their build path or at worst delay it without changing their damage? This only affects their 6-item case, as both will get equal mileage out of Deathcap. Kayle can itemize DFG instead of Lich Bane and keep bursting and Ziggs doesn't really need it either. 

3) Are you aware that TF and Fizz get hit far worse by this nerf than the 2 competitive Lich Bane users (Akali is a competitive niche pick atm)?

4) The only impact this would is removing some tower-pushing capability from Ziggs and Kayle as well as making them slower, at the cost of nerfing anyone else who might have picked up this item. Kayle's recent mana buffs to her ult mean she barely values the stat, and Ziggs will build Athene's. 80 AP is nice but obtainable elsewhere. Does that seem like a reasonable conclusion?

5) I don't understand these changes. What is their purpose, Riot?

**TL;DR:**

The Lich Bane nerfs disproportionately affect Twisted Fate and Fizz, neither of whom are dominating competitive play, over Kayle and Ziggs

Even if Kayle and Ziggs were in need of more nerfing (debate that as you please), all this does is remove or delay their purchase of Lich Bane. They get the same champion damage spike (or better in Ziggs' case) from buying Deathcap instead. 

Lich Bane is not a dominant competitive item, and nerfing it will only marginalize its niche as the "sustained damage mage item" further compared to DFG, Zhonya's, and Rabadon's.

EDIT: Apparently bulleted lists aren't working, so the formatting looks like crap. Sorry guys.

Well, that's just the thing. If they're out to get Kayle and Ziggs, this nerf won't do it. They have alternate itemization choices that allow them to keep up in damage until the 6-item case. I have math that shows that. 

The only champions who might use Lich Bane that I didn't add are Ahri and Lulu. But I don't see a strong case for nerfing Ahri. Not sure on Lulu tbh, but if it's just Lulu, why target Lich Bane when the buffs to TF and Fizz don't remotely make up for that.
